name: Boss Hunt
description: This game is an top-down RPG. The combat system is very basic, its kinda like the old zelda games. I've been working on this game in my spare time. The art isn't the greatest and I'm not a very experienced programmer.  Its a very short game but I truly did enjoy working on it. I hope I can learn from this project and become a better developer out of it. I may or may not continue working on this project but I would love feedback on it.
